resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81958</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81958</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing an Author Page</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura de una página de autor</string>
            <string language="ga">Leathanach Údair a Scríobh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben einer Autor Seite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inscription d'une page d'auteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrevendo uma página do autor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura della pagina dell'autore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο μιας σελίδας συντακτών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children are encouraged to write an author page in the third person to describe themselves and to copy their piece of writing in the book they have made and illustrated.</string>
            <string language="es">Se anima a los niños a que escriban una página de autor en la tercera persona para describirse a sí mismos y copiar su obra escrita en el libro que hayan hecho e ilustrado.</string>
            <string language="ga">Spreagtar na leanaí le leathanach údair a scríobh sa tríú pearsa chun cur síos orthu féin agus an píosa a scríobhann siad a chóipeáil isteach a leabhar a rinne siad agus a léirigh siad.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder werden angeregt, eine Autor Seite in die 
dritte Person zu schreiben, um sich zu beschreiben und ihr Stück des 
Schreibens in das Buch zu kopieren, das sie und veranschaulicht 
gebildet haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des enfants sont encouragés à écrire une page 
d'auteur chez la troisième personne pour se décrire et pour copier 
leur morceau d'inscription dans le livre qu'ils ont fait et illustré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças são incentivadas escrever uma página
do autor na terceira pessoa para descrever-se e para copí sua parte 
de escrita no livro que fizeram e ilustrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini sono consigliati a scrivere una pagina 
dell'autore nella terza persona per descriversi e per copiare la loro 
parte di scrittura nel libro che hanno fatto ed illustrato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά ενθαρρύνονται για να γράψουν μια σελίδα 
συντακτών στο τρίτο πρόσωπο για να περιγραφούν και για να 
αντιγράψουν το κομμάτι γραψίματός τους στο βιβλίο που έχουν 
κάνει και έχουν επεξηγήσει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">9-11</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>lesson plan</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Kennedy;Eithne;
FN:Eithne Kennedy 
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>427</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
